data.title: [ios] ccui.EditBox, bug when hide keyboard without enter.
data.body:
I have a ccui.EditBox used as username input:
1. Remove old app
2. reinstall my app using Xcode run
3. run app, tap the ccui.EditBox, switch IME to **English (US)**
4. When input `li` and the `Ali` will have focus, see attached image.
5. Click outside of keyboard, the keyboard hides, and the ccui.EditBox will have `li` filled.
6. ccui.EditBox:getText() will returns `Ali`.

![1_pic](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20248/8473509/c58e596e-20dc-11e5-8af4-0a4c45114c5a.jpg)

I tested under **iOS 8.4** (iPhone 6 Plus) and **iOS 8.3** (iPad Air 2).

_PS: my boss Mr. Li ask that this bug shall name after him._

data.title: iOS: depth/stencil buffers attributes are ignored
data.body:
1. disable depth and stencil buffers: `GLView::setGLContextAttrs({8, 8, 8, 0, 0});` usually from `AppDelegate::initGLContextAttrs` 
2. `GLViewImpl::convertAttrs` checks for RGBA8888 and 24+8(depth+stencil) only
3. otherwise default will be used `kEAGLColorFormatRGB565`/`GL_DEPTH_COMPONENT16`

data.title: JSB cc.easeBounceIn(...).reverse is not a function
data.body:
> I read api document said cc.EaseBounceIn has a static function named
> "reverse" , it works in html5 but reports TypeError in jsb.
> here is the code i wrote
> moveY.easing(cc.easeBounceIn().reverse());

data.title: Rewrote all action ease classes to remove the redundancy of having a …
data.body:
…single class definition for every possible ease function. This has been done through some template classes which accept functions as arguments.

This makes both header and source file much shorter and much more maintanable. Readability shouldn't be a concern since now there is almost no code to read.

Performance should identical since everything is bound at compile time. The following patch should be compatible with all recent (C++11) compilers but I have no way to test it, I tested it on LLVM3.4 on a OS X machine.

This patch also gives the possiblity to have ready to go custom ease function without the need to sublass ActionEase at all (as long as the prototype of the function is supported).

data.title: Refine release docs for Cocos2d-x v3.7rc0
Add cc.director.setClearColor for the web engine

milestone.title: v3.8
milestone.description:
This version is planned to only "fix existing bugs" and "unfinished tasks".
We need to improve the quality after a 3D rush in v3.6 and v3.7.

data.body:
Already done in Cpp: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/cocos/base/CCDirector.cpp#L691
1. This feature should be supported by WebGL and Canvas renderer
2. Transparent color should be supported

WebGL sample code provided by @jwu 

```
this._contextOptions = {
        alpha: this.transparent,
        antialias: options.antialias,
        premultipliedAlpha: this.transparent && this.transparent !== 'notMultiplied',
        stencil: true,
        preserveDrawingBuffer: options.preserveDrawingBuffer
    };
var gl = this.view.getContext('webgl', this._contextOptions) || this.view.getContext('experimental-webgl', this._contextOptions);
```
